name: Pigeon & Pete
description:
Pigeon & Pete is a puzzle platformer game  where you must take control of both Pigeon and Pete to solve puzzles by pooping and platforming! 💩

Pigeon and Pete form a strong bond together after Pete's wallet was stolen by a gang of rebel pigeons! Pigeon discovered Pete and promised that he would help Pete reclaim his wallet! Join them on their poop-tastic adventure throughout the city! 💩

This game was made for the Brackey's 2022.2 Game Jam in 7 days.

CONTROLS:  PETEPIGEONA, D - Move Left/RightW,A,S,D - Move Up/Left/Down/RightSpace - JumpSpace - PoopRight-Click - Switch to PigeonRight-Click - Switch to PeteR - Restart LevelR - Restart Level WHO'S BEHIND PIGEON & PETE?
  • Lewis Moholt - Programmer, Animation, Audio, Level Design, UI.
  • Rachel Thomas - Programmer, Animation, Cinematics, UI. 
  • Joseph Morgan - Programmer, Level Design.
  • Matthew Watson - Programmer, UI.
